an4.61:1.1: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho anathapindikam gahapatim bhagava etadavoca:
an4.61:2.1: “Cattarome, gahapati, dhamma ittha kanta manapa dullabha lokasmim.
an4.61:2.3: Bhoga me uppajjantu sahadhammenati, ayam pathamo dhammo ittho kanto manapo dullabho lokasmim.
an4.61:3.1: Bhoge laddha sahadhammena yaso me agacchatu saha natihi saha upajjhayehiti, ayam dutiyo dhammo ittho kanto manapo dullabho lokasmim.
an4.61:4.1: Bhoge laddha sahadhammena yasam laddha saha natihi saha upajjhayehi ciram jivami dighamayum palemiti, ayam tatiyo dhammo ittho kanto manapo dullabho lokasmim.
an4.61:5.1: Bhoge laddha sahadhammena yasam laddha saha natihi saha upajjhayehi ciram jivitva dighamayum paletva kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjamiti, ayam catuttho dhammo ittho kanto manapo dullabho lokasmim.
an4.61:5.2: Ime kho, gahapati, cattaro dhamma ittha kanta manapa dullabha lokasmim.
an4.61:6.1: Imesam kho, gahapati, catunnam dhammanam itthanam kantanam manapanam dullabhanam lokasmim cattaro dhamma patilabhaya samvattanti.
an4.61:7.2: Idha, gahapati, ariyasavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathagatassa bodhim:
an4.61:7.3: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi, sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
an4.61:8.2: Idha, gahapati, ariyasavako panatipata pativirato hoti …pe… suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato hoti.
an4.61:9.2: Idha, gahapati, ariyasavako vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati muttacago payatapani vosaggarato yacayogo danasamvibhagarato.
an4.61:10.2: Abhijjhavisamalobhabhibhutena, gahapati, cetasa viharanto akiccam karoti, kiccam aparadheti.
an4.61:10.3: Akiccam karonto kiccam aparadhento yasa ca sukha ca dhamsati.
an4.61:10.4: Byapadabhibhutena, gahapati, cetasa viharanto akiccam karoti, kiccam aparadheti.
an4.61:10.5: Akiccam karonto kiccam aparadhento yasa ca sukha ca dhamsati.
an4.61:10.6: Thinamiddhabhibhutena, gahapati, cetasa viharanto akiccam karoti kiccam aparadheti.
an4.61:10.7: Akiccam karonto kiccam aparadhento yasa ca sukha ca dhamsati.
an4.61:10.8: Uddhaccakukkuccabhibhutena, gahapati, cetasa viharanto akiccam karoti, kiccam aparadheti.
an4.61:10.9: Akiccam karonto kiccam aparadhento yasa ca sukha ca dhamsati.
an4.61:10.10: Vicikicchabhibhutena, gahapati, cetasa viharanto akiccam karoti, kiccam aparadheti.
an4.61:10.11: Akiccam karonto kiccam aparadhento yasa ca sukha ca dhamsati.
an4.61:11.1: Sa kho so, gahapati, ariyasavako abhijjhavisamalobho cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditva abhijjhavisamalobham cittassa upakkilesam pajahati.
an4.61:11.2: Byapado cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditva byapadam cittassa upakkilesam pajahati.
an4.61:11.3: Thinamiddham cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditva thinamiddham cittassa upakkilesam pajahati.
an4.61:11.4: Uddhaccakukkuccam cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditva uddhaccakukkuccam cittassa upakkilesam pajahati.
an4.61:11.5: Vicikiccha cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditva vicikiccham cittassa upakkilesam pajahati.
an4.61:12.1: Yato ca kho, gahapati, ariyasavakassa abhijjhavisamalobho cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditva abhijjhavisamalobho cittassa upakkileso pahino hoti.
an4.61:12.2: Byapado cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditva byapado cittassa upakkileso pahino hoti.
an4.61:12.3: Thinamiddham cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditva thinamiddham cittassa upakkileso pahino hoti.
an4.61:12.4: Uddhaccakukkuccam cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditva uddhaccakukkuccam cittassa upakkileso pahino hoti.
an4.61:12.5: Vicikiccha cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditva vicikiccha cittassa upakkileso pahino hoti.
an4.61:12.6: Ayam vuccati, gahapati, ariyasavako mahapanno puthupanno apatadaso pannasampanno.
an4.61:12.8: Imesam kho, gahapati, catunnam dhammanam itthanam kantanam manapanam dullabhanam lokasmim ime cattaro dhamma patilabhaya samvattanti.
an4.61:13.1: Sa kho so, gahapati, ariyasavako utthanaviriyadhigatehi bhogehi bahabalaparicitehi sedavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi cattari pattakammani katta hoti.
an4.61:13.3: Idha, gahapati, ariyasavako utthanaviriyadhigatehi bhogehi bahabalaparicitehi sedavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi attanam sukheti pineti samma sukham pariharati.
an4.61:13.4: Matapitaro sukheti pineti samma sukham pariharati.
an4.61:13.5: Puttadaradasakammakaraporise sukheti pineti samma sukham pariharati.
an4.61:13.6: Mittamacce sukheti pineti samma sukham pariharati.
an4.61:13.7: Idamassa pathamam thanagatam hoti pattagatam ayatanaso paribhuttam.
an4.61:14.1: Puna caparam, gahapati, ariyasavako utthanaviriyadhigatehi bhogehi bahabalaparicitehi sedavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi ya ta honti apada aggito va udakato va rajato va corato va appiyato va dayadato, tatharupasu apadasu pariyodhaya samvattati.
an4.61:14.3: Idamassa dutiyam thanagatam hoti pattagatam ayatanaso paribhuttam.
an4.61:15.1: Puna caparam, gahapati, ariyasavako utthanaviriyadhigatehi bhogehi bahabalaparicitehi sedavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi pancabalim katta hoti—
an4.61:15.3: Idamassa tatiyam thanagatam hoti pattagatam ayatanaso paribhuttam.
an4.61:16.1: Puna caparam, gahapati, ariyasavako utthanaviriyadhigatehi bhogehi bahabalaparicitehi sedavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi ye te samanabrahmana madappamada pativirata khantisoracce nivittha ekamattanam damenti, ekamattanam samenti, ekamattanam parinibbapenti, tatharupesu samanabrahmanesu uddhaggikam dakkhinam patitthapeti sovaggikam sukhavipakam saggasamvattanikam.
an4.61:16.2: Idamassa catuttham thanagatam hoti pattagatam ayatanaso paribhuttam.
an4.61:17.1: Sa kho so, gahapati, ariyasavako utthanaviriyadhigatehi bhogehi bahabalaparicitehi sedavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi imani cattari pattakammani katta hoti.
an4.61:17.2: Yassa kassaci, gahapati, annatra imehi catuhi pattakammehi bhoga parikkhayam gacchanti, ime vuccanti, gahapati, bhoga atthanagata apattagata anayatanaso paribhutta.
an4.61:17.3: Yassa kassaci, gahapati, imehi catuhi pattakammehi bhoga parikkhayam gacchanti, ime vuccanti, gahapati, bhoga thanagata pattagata ayatanaso paribhuttati.
